attributes.action: Allow taxpayers to opt for health insurance rather than pay for an NHS that is not delivering value for money
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Taxpayers are paying over the odds for a health service that is unable to provide clean hospitals let alone hospitals that will provide us the latest drugs to help in the treatment of diseases such as cancer.

Citizens are forced to pay to this substandard system whether or not they use it.

We should be allowed to opt out of paying tax for this chaotic system in preference for personal health insurance so that we as individuals can ensure that we receive a good standard of care and value for money, something we are not receiving at the moment.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
